analysis.description:
BeatTokenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#174-203) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- preIcoEndTime == 0
	- icoPhase1EndTime == 0
	- icoPhase2EndTime == 0
	- icoPhase3EndTime == 0
	- contractEndTime == 0

Reentrancy in BeatTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#205-227):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(isWithinTokenAllocLimit(beatWeiAmount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#217-218)
	- determineCurrentStage(beatWeiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#218)

Reentrancy in BeatTokenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#174-203):
	External calls:
	- unsoldTokens = HARD_CAP - token.getTotalSupply() (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#197-198)
	- token.mint(beatTeamWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#201)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#202-203)

BeatTokenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#174-203) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beatTeamWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#201)

BeatTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#205-227) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,beatWeiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#223-224)

Reentrancy in BeatTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#205-227):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(isWithinTokenAllocLimit(beatWeiAmount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#217-218)
	- determineCurrentStage(beatWeiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#220)
	- ethWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#222-223)
	- icoPhase3EndTime (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#218)

Reentrancy in BeatTokenCrowdsale.determineCurrentStage (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#252-277):
	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):

	- icoPhase2EndTime (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#265-266)
	- icoPhase3EndTime (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#275-276)
	- preIcoEndTime (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#257)
	- stage (/unique_chucks/4/0x584bf48227509f93ae7c7f2ac2e3e4364d58050b.sol#258-259)
